name: Split Decision
description:
In "Split Decision" you play in an apocalyptic future where a meteor has hit the Earth splitting it into 3 different pieces. You have stayed behind to find out which fraction of the Earth is the most habitable for humans to return to! Your suit collects data form the atmosphere to see if the area is habitable or not, you are also equipped with anti-gravity boots which let you jump higher to get to out of reach places! 

Unfortunately, if you are playing in Safari there isn't any audio.
